info.description:
This is a spin-off story for June and Mimi from "The Naked Adventure of Forgetful Lilly".

June is an exhibitionist and loves to stage her know ENF situations much like Sun from "The Naked Adventures of Forgetful Lilly", but June actually likes to try and stay naked. She is almost always with her best friend Mimi who is the exact opposite of her. Mimi hates being naked in front of people even if it's just June and gets easily embarrassed about seeing other people naked especially if it's June. Mimi is also a bit of a klutz. She wears glasses and is practically blind without them. June loves to tease and strip her whenever possible. Many people assume that because Mimi always puts up with June's antics that they're a couple which she always denies. Their age can range from between 19-26 in the different stories.

Rules:
No mentions of drugs (legal/illegal), violence, derogatory names or any combination thereof. I hate stories like that. I want this story to be funny and lighthearted. You can mention alcohol because Alex, Claire, and Sun like to party. Kate and Rose are underage so no drinking for them and Lilly does drink, but only a little bit. Also don't put men in the story. Keep all the characters as attractive women.

P.S.
I also want to be clear that June is an exhibitionist not a nudist. Please don't just have her walking around naked in public places. It's a lot more fun if she "loses" her clothes first because she likes the feeling of appearing embarrassed. Also no masturbation scenes.
